H0.text: What is the name given to the largest bee in a hive. Monarcha

H1.text: What is the name given to the largest bee in a hive. Apiana

H2.text: What is the name given to the largest bee in a hive. Dominula

H3.text: What is the name given to the largest bee in a hive. Quene

A4.text: The queen bee's abdomen is longer than the worker bees surrounding her
